body:
All,


Alen Mahic and Ery Djunaedy from the University of Idaho Integrated Design Lab have packaged the scripts for calculating spatial Daylight Autonomy (sDA) and Annual Sunlight Exposure (ASE) replete with the prescribed blinds trigger as defined in LM-83.  Thanks to those of you who helped by reviewing it.  Here is the link (requires login):
http://www.idlboise.com/design-tool/lm-83-three-phase-daylight-simulation-script


If you are interested in the text of LM-83, it can be found here:
http://www.ies.org/store/product/approved-method-ies-spatial-daylight-autonomy-sda-and-annual-sunlight-exposure-ase-1287.cfm


Regards,
Kevin Van Den Wymelenberg, PhD
Director, UI Integrated Design Lab - Boise
Associate Professor of Architecture, University of Idaho
kevinv at uidaho.edu    desk:208.401.0641     cell:208.724.9456
306 S. 6th St. Boise ID 83702     www.uidaho.edu/idl
___
